mapper.select: SELECT ID , SUBJECT , CONTENT , EMAIL , VIEW_CNT , TO_CHAR(CRT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CRT_DT , TO_CHAR(MDFY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MDFY_DT , FILE_NAME , ORIGIN_FILE_NAME FROM BOARD ORDER BY ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD( ID, SUBJECT, CONTENT , EMAIL, VIEW_CNT , CRT_DT, MDFY_DT , FILE_NAME, ORIGIN_FILE_NAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOARD_PK.NEXTVAL, #{subject}, #{content} , #{email}, 0 , SYSDATE, SYSDATE , #{fileName}, #{originFileName} )
